details.purpose: La escala Comfort Conductual es una modificación de la escala Comfotr original (1992), utilizada para la evaluación del dolor en pacientes pediatricos en unidad de cuidados intensivos y, complementariamente, para la evaluación del nivel de sedación en pacientes no quirúrgicos en unidad de cuidados intensivos.
details.use: Utilizada para la evaluación del dolor y/o nivel de sedación en pacientes pediátricos internados en unidad de cuidados intensivos.
details.misuse: No debe ser utilizada para la evaluación del dolor y/o sedación en adultos.

details.purpose: The Comfort Behavioural scale is a modification of the original Comfort scale (1992), used for pain assesment in children in ICU and, complementarily, for sedation assessment in nonsurgical pediatric ICU patients.
details.use: Used for pain and/or sedation assessment in pediatric ICU patients.
details.misuse: Not to be used for pain and/or sedation assessment in adult populations.

items.items: A numerical scale for pain and/or sedation assessment in pediatric ICU patients.
Eyes closed, no response to changes in the environment.
Child closes his/her eyes frequently, less responsive to the environment.
Child appears agitated but remains in control.
Child appears very agitated, just able to control.
Severe distress with loss of control
Score only in mechanically ventilated children.
Either restlessness or resistance to ventilator.
Actively breathes against ventilator or coughs regularly

Score only in spontaneously breathing children.
Quiet breathing, with no crying sounds.
Vigorous movements including torso and head
Vigorous movements including torso and head.

Reduced muscle tone; less resistance than normal
